mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tk.item_owner, tk.item_code, tk.item_variety, tk.item_cgy_code, tk.item_color, tk.item_lenth, tk.item_width, tk.item_thick, tk.item_weight, tk.item_yb_type, tn.ord_code, tn.item_num FROM t_stock tk inner join ( SELECT ts.item_code, ts.ord_code, count( ts.item_code ) AS item_num FROM t_out_stock t INNER JOIN t_out_stock_detail td ON t.out_code = td.out_code INNER JOIN T_STOCK ts ON ts.bar_code = td.bar_code WHERE t.out_code = #{outCode} GROUP BY ts.item_variety, ts.ord_code, ts.item_code, ts.item_cgy_code, ts.item_color, ts.item_lenth, ts.item_width, ts.item_thick, ts.item_yb_type, ts.item_owner, ts.item_weight ) tn on tn.item_code = tk.item_code and tn.ord_code = tk.ord_code
